content:
Here's my next response:

I'll definitely ask Sarah if she's seen the shirt, and I'll check my car and bags too. And thanks for the tips on finding a good shoe repair place - I'll definitely do some research online and ask around for recommendations. By the way, I was thinking about my closet organization project from last month, and I realized that I got rid of a lot of clothes that didn't fit or were just plain ugly. I ended up selling that old designer jacket I never wore, and I was surprised by how much I got for it - $120! Do you have any tips on how to declutter my closet further and make the most of the space I have?
